abstract: Ritz Crackerfuls was introduced in 2009, with same target audience as Ritz crackers: women ages 35 to 54. But in a new humorous campaign, the product will be pitched at busy adults, ages 25 to 54.
snippet: Ritz Crackerfuls was introduced in 2009, with same target audience as Ritz crackers: women ages 35 to 54. But in a new humorous campaign, the product will be pitched at busy adults, ages 25 to 54.
lead_paragraph: Kraft Foods is reintroducing a snack product that it brought to market three years ago and calls successful. Why? Because with more “oomph” added to the marketing mix, like a social game on Facebook, it could be more popular, executives said.

headline.main: Kraft Tries Again With a Ritz Snack, Aiming Younger
